    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public static HeapMemory allocate(long size)
        Allocates heap memory via HeapMemoryAllocator.
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the memory to allocate.
        Returns:
        The allocated memory.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If size is greater than the maximum allowed size for an array on the Java heap - Integer.MAX_VALUE - 5

      • wrap

        public static HeapMemory wrap(byte[] bytes)
        Wraps the given bytes in a HeapMemory object.
        Parameters:
        bytes - The bytes to wrap.
        Returns:
        The wrapped bytes.
